name: Cigars365byCigarsNearMeFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A series of daily cigar suggestions from Cigars Near Me, the new social media web app dedicated to cigars. Explore the world of cigars one day at a time. 
Explore the world of cigars one day at a time. 

Cigars 365 gives you detailed descriptions and reviews of the most popular cigars in the world. Discover new cigars and learn interesting facts about old favorites. 

Brought to you by Cigars Near Me. Your source for finding a cigar shop, bar or lounge anywhere in the world. Learn more at https://cigarsnearme.com.

Please leave a review if you love this skill, or send us an email with your suggestions at support@boxpressd.com. Your reviews help us to keep making more great skills for brothers and sisters of the leaf just like you. Long ashes!
